title: How black is black (A)
creator_contributor_role: LOUD Media Festival of Youth Culture and the Arts, production company
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
description: How much Aboriginal are you?, we are asked by a group of indigenous Australian children. "How black is black" questions the issue of blackness and how much Aboriginality is assumed to be an issue of skin colour. Through a series of stills and colourful action sequences, thirteen year old director Jade Woods presents a film about identity, friendship and race. Soundtrack provided by the Sisters Underground.
